name: Gop Tear - Android
description:
Hey I'm Julian Osorio.

Try to survive as long as you can, is just that! Don't hit buses, but get timers, every 30 seconds the speed will increase by itself. Recommended to hit the HOW TO PLAY button.

Hey! This was made by me, I know is small but I'm starting, don't be harsh on me :D, still has ONE bug, doesn't make your cell explode so don't worry, and also it doesn't crash the game.

If you recognize the music and the designs, hit the CREDITS button I give the names of the owners of the art.

Thanks for playing, is what I live for.
